channel.title: Brewtownsports
channel.description: This show is about Milwaukee Brewers Baseball. Mr. Brewtown covers the Milwaukee Brewers and Major League Baseball with a unique and concise prospective. Images and content used on this site are used under the fair use provision of the Copyright Act for purposes of comment, criticism, and news reporting. Brewtownsports is not affiliated with the Milwaukee Brewers, MLB or any sporting teams discussed.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Milwaukee Brewers Baseball News and Notes. You can listen to the Show on Stitcher.com,Tunein.com and on iTunes
channel.itunes:author: Mr. Brewtown
channel.itunes:summary: This show is about Milwaukee Brewers Baseball. Mr. Brewtown covers the Milwaukee Brewers and Major League Baseball with a unique and concise prospective. Brewtownsports is not affiliated with the Milwaukee Brewers, MLB or any sporting teams discussed.

item.title: Episode 394
item.description: The Brewers go with power in the first round of the June draft. Yo on the Bump for the Brewers. Thanks to everyone who has taken time to listen to the Show over the last 3 1/2 years.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: The Brewers go with power in the first round of the June draft. Yo on the Bump for the Brewers. Thanks to everyone who has taken time to listen to the Show over the last 3 1/2 years.

item.title: Episode 393
item.description: Jonathan Lucroy’s wife gets ‘hate mail’ on Facebook over husband’s broken hand. Brewers defeat Kershaw to clinch road series, Gallardo outlasts Dodgers ace, Gomez collects four hits in win. Greinke, Billingsley matched up in series finale, Dodgers slugger Kemp expected to return to disabled list.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: Jonathan Lucroy’s wife gets ‘hate mail’ on Facebook over husband’s broken hand. Brewers defeat Kershaw to clinch road series, Gallardo outlasts Dodgers ace, Gomez collects four hits in win. Greinke, Billingsley matched up in series finale, Dodgers slugger Kemp expected to return to disabled list.

item.title: Episode 392
item.description: Mike Fiers and Martin Maldonaldo make Brewers history in win last night. It's okay that Dodgers Fans Booed Ryan Braun in their stadium.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: Mike Fiers and Martin Maldonaldo make Brewers history in win last night. It's okay that Dodgers Fans Booed Ryan Braun in their stadium.

item.title: Episode 391
item.description: More injuries for the Brewers. Lucroy out 4 to 6 weeks with broken right hand. Big win for the Brewers and Marcum, both teams go to their minor leagues for tonight starters.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: More injuries for the Brewers. Lucroy out 4 to 6 weeks with broken right hand. Big win for the Brewers and Marcum, both teams go to their minor leagues for tonight starters.

item.title: Episode 390
item.description: The Brewers lose 2 of 3 to the D-backs,Travis Ishikowa goes on the 15 day D.L.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: The Brewers lose 2 of 3 to the D-backs,Travis Ishikowa goes on the 15 day D.L.

item.title: Episode 389
item.description: The Brewers beat the D-backs but lose another starter to injuries. Greinke on the bump tonight.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: The Brewers beat the D-backs but lose another starter to injuries. Greinke on the bump tonight.

item.title: Episode 388
item.description: The Brewers win as Lucroy go deep. Marco Estrada leaves the Game and will get a MRI. News and Notes for your Milwaukee Brewers and MLB.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: The Brewers win as Lucroy go deep. Marco Estrada leaves the Game and will get a MRI. News and Notes for your Milwaukee Brewers and MLB.

item.title: Episode 387
item.description: The Brewers have lost 4 games in a row to the Astros and the Twins, can it get any worse then that?. Zack Greinke is on the Bump for the Crew this afternoon. John Gibson of Japanesebaseball.com joins the Big Show and talks about Baseball in Japan.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: The Brewers have lost 4 games in a row to the Astros and the Twins, can it get any worse then that?. Zack Greinke is on the Bump for the Crew this afternoon. John Gibson of Japanesebaseball.com joins the Big Show and talks about Baseball in Japan.

item.title: Episode 386
item.description: The Brewers get shutout by the Astros 4-0. Twins come into Miller Park to start Inter league play. Rickie Weeks went 1 for 5 and is now Batting .156.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: The Brewers get shutout by the Astros 4-0. Twins come into Miller Park to start Inter league play. Rickie Weeks went 1 for 5 and is now Batting .156.

item.title: Episode 385
item.description: Randy Wolf last 4 innings in Brewers lose to the Houston Astros. Gary McDonald of http://metsmusings.podomatic.com joins us and talks about the Mets and their Future. Interleague play starts this weekend.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: Randy Wolf last 4 innings in Brewers lose to the Houston Astros. Gary McDonald of http://metsmusings.podomatic.com joins us and talks about the Mets and their Future. Interleague play starts this weekend.

item.title: Episode 384
item.description: Zack Greinke shuts out the Mets 8-0 and gets the Brewers seventh quality start in as many games. Travis Ishikawa goes deep twice and Weeks homers in his return to the lineup. Randy Wolf on the Mound tonight as the Brewers play two in Houston.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: Zack Greinke shuts out the Mets 8-0 and gets the Brewers seventh quality start in as many games. Travis Ishikawa goes deep twice and Weeks homers in his return to the lineup. Randy Wolf on the Mound tonight as the Brewers play two in Houston.

item.title: Episode 383
item.description: The Brewers take on the Mets in New York. Zack Greinke was upset when a quality outing got away in San Francisco on May 4, continuing his trouble in road games. He is 1-1 with a 7.20 ERA in three away starts this season and 30-46 with a 4.27 ERA in his career. Rickie Weeks is Back in the lineup for the Brewers.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: The Brewers take on the Mets in New York. Zack Greinke was upset when a quality outing got away in San Francisco on May 4, continuing his trouble in road games. He is 1-1 with a 7.20 ERA in three away starts this season and 30-46 with a 4.27 ERA in his career. Rickie Weeks is Back in the lineup for the Brewers.

item.title: Episode 382
item.description: Major League Baseball management has fired Shyam Das, the arbitrator who overturned Ryan Braun's drug suspension in February. The Brewers Bullpen gives up another Game after a quality Start from Marco Estrada.Remember to Like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter and also on Google+ Brewtownsports.

item.itunes:summary: Major League Baseball management has fired Shyam Das, the arbitrator who overturned Ryan Braun's drug suspension in February. The Brewers Bullpen gives up another Game after a quality Start from Marco Estrada.Remember to Like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter and also on Google+ Brewtownsports.

item.title: Episode 381
item.description: Brewers and Cubs this weekend... Wolf will try to turn around his season against Matt Garza... Greinke goes 8 complete and strikes out 11 in Brewers lose to the Reds 2-1... Ryan Braun is on a Hot streak over the last 6 Games and Weeks and Hart are not.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: Brewers and Cubs this weekend... Wolf will try to turn around his season against Matt Garza... Greinke goes 8 complete and strikes out 11 in Brewers lose to the Reds 2-1... Ryan Braun is on a Hot streak over the last 6 Games and Weeks and Hart are not.

item.title: Episode 380
item.description: Tony Plush is Back and helps Brewers beat The Reds 8-3. The Brewers owner likes the job that Doug Melvin and RR are doing so he renewed their contracts. Zack Greinke is on the Mound for the Brewers today, game time is at 12:10 Wisconsin time.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: Tony Plush is Back and helps Brewers beat The Reds 8-3. The Brewers owner likes the job that Doug Melvin and RR are doing so he renewed their contracts. Zack Greinke is on the Mound for the Brewers today, game time is at 12:10 Wisconsin time.

item.title: Episode 379
item.description: The Brewers lose to the Reds 6-1, same old story for the Brewers this year. Donald Driver got screwed on his scores on DWTS. Herb Kohl needs to sell the Milwaukee Bucks. Listener E-mail is answered.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: The Brewers lose to the Reds 6-1, same old story for the Brewers this year. Donald Driver got screwed on his scores on DWTS. Herb Kohl needs to sell the Milwaukee Bucks. Listener E-mail is answered.

item.title: Episode 378
item.description: First Base is open is open for the Brewers, who will step up for the Crew. Brewers lose two of three to the Giants and come home to take on the Reds.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: First Base is open is open for the Brewers, who will step up for the Crew. Brewers lose two of three to the Giants and come home to take on the Reds.

item.title: Episode 377
item.description: Lucroy and Ramirez drive in 2 each and Loe gets win over the Giants on the road 6-4. Randy Wolf looks to turn a Bad start to the season, as he toes the rubber at 3:05ct against Baumgarder. Brewers move Weeks to the #2 hole in lineup with Braun out of last nights game. Carlos Gomez left the Game with injury.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown

Randy Wolf looks to turn a Bad start to the season, as he toes the rubber at 3:05ct against Baumgarder. Brewers move Weeks to the #2 hole in lineup with Braun out of last nights game. Carlos Gomez left the Game with injury.

item.title: Episode 376
item.description: The Brewers lost to Jeff Suppan and the San Diego Padres. Matt Gamel is lost for the season with injury and Ryan Braun is listed as day to day, and hopes to be ready for Fridays game against Giants.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: The Brewers lost to Jeff Suppan and the San Diego Padres. Matt Gamel is lost for the season with injury and Ryan Braun is listed as day to day, and hopes to be ready for Fridays game against Giants.

item.title: Episode 375
item.description: Ryan Braun goes 4 for 5 with 3 home runs. That was pretty much the Highlight of the victory for the Brewers. Brewers have 5 more games in the two toughest Ballparks for power hitters, Petko Park and AT&T in San Fran.
item.dc:creator: Mr. Brewtown
item.itunes:summary: Ryan Braun goes 4 for 5 with 3 home runs. That was pretty much the Highlight of the victory for the Brewers. Brewers have 5 more games in the two toughest Ballparks for power hitters, Petko Park and AT&T in San Fran.

item.title: Episode 374
item.description: The Brewers beat the Cards in St.Louis, I repeat the Brewers beat the Cards in St.Louis. Zack Greinke gets the win and the Axman get's his 48 strait save. Padre's and Brewers out on the coast tonight. A real Brewers Fan is on the Show and helps me Brake it all Down.
